name: get_geo_location_of_ip_address
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mocking_rock.
Tool description: An APIs collection for getting sample profiles and city Data for testings for frontend or mock testings.    
API description: Retrieve the geographical location and other details of a given IP address using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

ip.description: The IPV4 address for which geographical information is to be retrieved.
